official_title: A bill to require that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to include a reference to Easton, Pennsylvania, in the official title of the metropolitan statistical area of which it is a part.
